Post.title: connect  express
Post._content:
## Http

HTTP 


	        -> Request  -> 
	Client                  Server
	        <- Response <-    


### HTTP 

Request 


	<method> <request-URL> <version> <headers>

	<entity-body> 


Response 


	<version> <status> <reason-phrase> <headers>

	<entity-body>



## node http 

node  http  Http Server 

:


	var http = require('http');
	http.createServer(function (req, res) {
	  res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'text/plain'});
	  res.end('Hello World\n');
	}).listen(1337, '127.0.0.1');
	console.log('Server running at http://127.0.0.1:1337/');


## Connect

### urlencoded




	var app = connect()
	  .use(connect.urlencoded())


Request Headers 


	Content-Type:application/x-www-form-urlencoded



### methodOverride

 http request method


	req.method = req.headers['x-http-method-override']


## Express

Express  Connect  

* http 
* url 

### http  Express 

Express  get, post, put, delete JS  http  [methods](https://github.com/visionmedia/node-methods)  node  http Express 

 Express  ./lib/application.js


	app.get -> router.get -> router.route

## 


	ctrl + F    scroll forward one screen
	                       
	ctrl + B    scroll backward one screen
	            
	ctrl + D    scroll forward half screen down
	            
	ctrl + U    scroll backward half screen up
	            
	z + Enter   Move current line to top of screen and scroll
	            
	z.          Move current line to center of screen and scroll
	                     
	z-          Move current line to bottom of screen and scroll
	            
	[line]z     z


## 


	ctrl + ~    
	ctrl + l    
	.

30





## Apache  SSI


SSI  (Server Side Include)[](http://httpd.apache.org/docs/current/howto/ssi.html)

```html
<!--#include file="layouts/header.html"-->
...
<!--#include file="layouts/footer.html"-->
```

Post.content:
1. 0

html 

<form action="/avatar" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data" class="reform-file-ctrl avatar">
 <input type="file" name="avatar" class="file">
 <span class="icon"></span>
</form>

css 

.reform-file-ctrl {
  width: 180px; height: 40px; overflow: hidden; position: relative;
}
.reform-file-ctrl .file, .reform-file-ctrl .icon {
  display: block; width: 180px; height: 40px;
  position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0;
  font-size: 100em; background: red;
}
.reform-file-ctrl .file {
  opacity: 0;
  filter: alpha(opacity=0);
  z-index: 1;
}

ajax

XMLHttpRequest2

target iframe

html 

<form action="/avatar" method="post" enctype="multipart/form-data" target="avatar-iframe">
 <input type="file">
 <input type="submit">
</form>
<iframe name="avatar-iframe" src="about:blank" width="0" height="0"></iframe>

css 

iframe { display: none; }

iframe js html iframe

jquery imgAreaSelect
